title: Image recognition that triggers augmented reality
description: Matt Mills and Tamara Roukaerts demonstrate Aurasma, a new augmented reality tool that can seamlessly animate the world as seen through a smartphone. Going beyond previous augmented reality, their "auras" can do everything from making a painting talk to overlaying live news onto a printed newspaper.
author: Matt Mills
keywords: TED, talks, demo, design, interface design, science, technology, communication, augmented reality, art, computers, open-source, science and art, empathy, engineering, programming, innovation, code, software
